    • Method Detail

      • forJobCatalog

        public JobSpecMonitor forJobCatalog(GobblinInstanceDriver instanceDriver,
                                    MutableJobCatalog jobCatalog)
                             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JobSpecMonitorFactory
        Add a JobSpecMonitor that will be notified of new jobs. JobSpecMonitor will call put for any new / updated jobs, and remove for any deleted jobs.
        Specified by:
        forJobCatalog in interface JobSpecMonitorFactory
        Parameters:
        instanceDriver - the GobblinInstanceDriver managing the job catalog; this can be used to access the environment for configuration
        jobCatalog - the job catalog to be notified for JobSpec operations.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • forConfig

        public JobSpecMonitor forConfig(Config localScopeConfig,
                                MutableJobCatalog jobCatalog)
                         throws IOException
        Create a SLAEventKafkaJobMonitor from an input Config. Useful for multiple monitors, where the configuration of each monitor is scoped.
        Parameters:
        localScopeConfig - The sub-Config for this monitor without any namespacing (e.g. the key for topic should simply be "topic").
        Throws:
        IOException
